description: Tree number - T1Tree type - EucalyptusApprox Height - 18mLocation - Front garden.Service - Fell and grindWork required- Fell and grind out stump to a minimum of 250mm below the stumps current ground level and leave all stump's arising to allow for ground settlementReason - tree is damaging drains at adjacent property.Tree number - T2Tree type - RobiniaApprox Height - 16mApprox Crown Spread Diameter - 10mLocation - Front gardenService - Crown ReductionWork required- Crown reduce height by approximately 5-6m and sides by approximately 2- 2.5m pruning to suitable growth points leaving tree ag approximately 10m tall and 6m wide.Reason - As part of continued maintenanceTree number - T3Tree type - horse chestnutApprox Height - 10mApprox Crown Spread Diameter - 8mLocation - Front gardenService - Crown ReductionWork required- Crown reduce by removing approximately 2-3m from height and 1.5-2m from sides pruning to suitable growth points leaving tree approximately 8m tall and 6m wide.Reason - As part of continued maintenanceTree number - T4Tree type - purple plumApprox Height - 6mApprox Crown Spread Diameter - 6mLocation - Front gardenService - Crown ReduceWork required- Crown reduce over driveway only by removing approximately 1.5m pruning to suitable growth pointsReason - As part of continued maintenanceTree number - T5Tree type - macrocarpaApprox Height - 12mLocation - Rear boundaryService - Crown lift to 4m above ground levelWork required - Crown lift over clients parking area and neighbours parking area by approximately 4m pruning to to suitable growth pointsReason - As part of continued maintenance
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
